articles.author: Scott Horner, Dustin Dopirak
articles.title: Cleveland Cavs vs Indiana Pacers Game 2 live results: Pacers pull off another crazy last-minute comeback - IndyStar
articles.description: The Indiana Pacers beat the Cleveland Cavaliers in Game 2 of their NBA playoff series. Here are live updates, scores, highlights, results.
articles.content:
The Indiana Pacers make another crazy last-minute comeback Tuesday night, beating the Cleveland Cavaliers 120-119 in Game 2 of the Eastern Conference semifinals.
